description: Automatic transmission, Used, 2350 cc KIA Sorento is a 2010 Petrol vehicle. The mileage of this vehicle is 100,000 km and it comes equipped with Anti-lock braking system, Back camera, Electric mirrors, Multi-function steering wheel, Power door locks, Power steering, Power windows, Rear window wiper A/C: Front, Airbag: Driver, Airbag: Passenger, AM/FM stereo, CD audio system, Cup holders, DVD player, iPod /USB compatible Alloy wheels, Fog lights, Spoiler, Tinted glass, HID lights features. Beige & Grey Leather interior.
name: Kia Sorento  2010
